channel.title: Owner online
channel.description: yes well i was wondering if some1 nice can leave me directions telling how i can spawn two old men outside of my varrock training area telling other online users wether i am online or not and also tell them information too.

item.title: Owner online
item.dc:creator: @t_cups t cups
item.description:
@t_cups wrote:

spawn = 2253 2830 3351 0 3276 3431 3268 3426 2 Wise old man

add that but change the 2253 and the 2830 to your coords 2253 = x and 2830 = y
and then go to npchandler and add this underneath “moo”

					[code]if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay
					{
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("master"))
						{
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "master is online!";
						}
						else
						{
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "master is offline!";
						}
											}[/code]

just change master to your name.

Read full topic
